description:
* Based on the http://anidb.net/t2805 [4-koma] manga by http://anidb.net/cr34095 [Akane], serialised in http://anidb.net/cr28845 [Dengeki Maou]; the manga is itself a spin-off of http://anidb.net/a8218 [The Idolmaster], a raising simulation and rhythm game by http://anidb.net/cr3512 [Bandai Namco Games].
The overly active daily lives of http://anidb.net/ch8372 [765Pro]`s idols become even more frantic when the overly cute beings called Puchidolls — somewhat resembling their idols in looks and in character — show up at the studio, one by one.
[i]Note: The Director`s Cut versions (episodes S1 to S23) were released on the same media as the BD/DVD release of main series. The Director`s Cut version is a condensed telling of the original series, available exclusively on BD/DVD at the time of release.
The Director`s Cuts were released as follows:
BD/DVD Vol. 01: Ep 01-07
BD/DVD Vol. 02: Ep 08-15
BD/DVD Vol. 03: Ep 16-23[/i]

The first puchidols are introduced.
